comment: Yes the Chlorophytum is geophytic. They have big fat storage roots and some individuals die back to the ground in winter. I recommend that this species NOT be grown in frost free areas because it is very fecund and could become invasive. Sow seeds thinly because most seeds germinate and since most of the plant is below ground, the pot will get too crowded very fast. The flashy orange leaf bases will develop after the first year.
